DOC.brief_summary: Methods study to characterize early indicators of weight loss in people.
DOC.brief_title: Methods Study to Characterize Early Indicators of Weight Loss in People
DOC.criteria: Subjects >=18 years of age with BMI >= 30 and < 40 kg/m2 Females, those with illnesses expected to cause weight loss, those without stable body weight within 3 months of screening.
